description: This file defines a React component called NoteList that renders a list of note items as mini cards with titles, tags, snippets, and update timestamps. It manages user interactions such as selecting notes.

methods.name: NoteList({ notes, onNoteClick, currentNote })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a list of note cards with clickable interaction, highlighting the current note, and showing note details.

ctags.name: NoteList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function NoteList({ notes, onNoteClick, currentNote }) {$/
